creditline: Gift of Rebecca and Gilbert Kerlin
description: interior scene; two beds with mosquito next, with two women laying on each bed; front woman wears pink sleeveless dress; back woman wears blue sleeveless dress; red floor, and yellow walls; window in URQ; chair in CL; book shelf with bottle of water and two books in LLQ
inscription: LRC, in red pigment: Horton Gardens, Colambo
signed: LRC, in red pigment: Sarah McEneaney 2002
text:
Philadelphia-based artist Sarah McEneaney often depicts herself and her immediate surroundings, carefully observing her environment and presenting it to viewers so they can get a peek into her world. She said of this scene,

I document my travels with small paintings on paper. They are finished works in and of themselves and sometimes lead to studio paintings once I am at home. [This work was] painted during a trip to Sri Lanka in 2002. My sister Anne and I are seen relaxing under mosquito nets and a ceiling fan in Colombo, Sri Lanka.
title: Horton Gardens
